metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000427 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
marked version 0.3.6 and earlier is vulnerable to an XSS attack in thedata: URI parser.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
node-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-marked package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9+dfsg-1').
